description_for_human: RSI, VIX, ROEなどの指標をもとに投資判断をスコア化し、過去の判断も記録・検索できるBotです。
description_for_model: This API receives market and technical indicators (e.g., RSI, VIX, ROE) and returns a judgment score with detailed comments. It also stores judgments in Pinecone and supports semantic search for similar past decisions.
